solution_line_template: The number of ripe mangoes from the tree is {ripe_fraction}*{total_mangoes} = <<{ripe_fraction}*{total_mangoes}={ripe_mangoes}>>{ripe_mangoes}
If Lindsay eats 60% of the ripe mangoes, she eats {eaten_percentage}*{ripe_mangoes} = <<{eaten_percentage}*{ripe_mangoes}={mangoes_eaten}>>{mangoes_eaten} mangoes.
The total number of ripe mangoes remaining is {ripe_mangoes}-{mangoes_eaten} =<<{ripe_mangoes}-{mangoes_eaten}={remaining_ripe_mangoes}>>{remaining_ripe_mangoes}
